scripts.copy: mkdir -p dist/css dist/js dist/img && cp src/index.html dist/ && cp -r src/js/* dist/js/ && cp -r src/img/* dist/img/ && cp src/favicon.ico dist/ && cp src/sw.js dist/ && cp src/site.webmanifest dist/
scripts.dev: npm run clean && npm run copy && npm run build:css && (npm run dev:css & npm run dev:serve)
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run copy && npm run build:css
